has a pull tab

Strobel: The upper is stitched at the border to a flexible woven material (rather than glued to a fibreboard). Commonly used in hiking and athletic shoes.
Vulcanised: The upper is fixed permanently onto the sole using either a liquid soling material
column26:
or rubber treated with heat and pressure
Warranty: 180 days against manufacturing defects only
